column4: Is there anyone here in the SF Bay Area who would like to meet IRL to discuss what Partimus.org is doing with Ubuntu in public schools?
that issue woul suit better in #ubuntu-offtopic . or the locochannel from SF

thanks for the tip. I put it here because all we use in the public schools we support is Ubuntu.  It is quite exciting, so I thought that ppl here might be stoked to learn that Ubuntu is making it into public schools
Where is the local Ubuntu channel, do you happen to know?
